digitalreasoning

Class ProperNameAggregator

  • java.lang.Object
    • digitalreasoning.ProperNameAggregator

  • public class ProperNameAggregator
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an executor service class which will aggregate all the proper names that are contained in files under a specified directory

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_WORKERS
      The default number of worker (threads) to use for aggregation.

      Constructor - that will initialize ProperNameAggregator

      Get the dictionary property The dictionary property contains a list of all proper names

      • execute

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> execute()
        The main execute method. It will create the worker threads to collect the proper names.
        Returns:
        List of all proper names

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This is main method which tests the ProperNameAggregator class.
        Parameters:
        args - takes two arguments

        args[0] directory parameter for the word source files

        args[1] is an optional dictionary parameter
